stepTitle: Two children push on opposite sides of a door during play. Both push horizontally and perpendicular to the door. One child pushes with a force of $$17.5$$ N at a distance of $$0.600$$ $$m$$ from the hinges, and the second child pushes at a distance of $$0.450$$ $$m$$. What force must the second child exert to keep the door from moving (in Newtons)? Assume friction is negligible.
